title: System Maintenance Scheduled
message: The portal will be unavailable on Saturday, October 25th from 2:00 AM to 6:00 AM for scheduled maintenance.

title: New Benefits Enrollment Period
message: Open enrollment for 2026 benefits is now available. Please review and update your selections by November 30th.

title: Holiday Office Closure
message: Our offices will be closed on Thursday, November 27th and Friday, November 28th for Thanksgiving.

title: IT Security Training Required
message: All employees must complete the annual cybersecurity training by October 31st. Access the course through the Learning portal.

title: New Employee Wellness Program
message: We're excited to announce our new wellness program! Sign up for fitness classes, meditation sessions, and health screenings.
